alert.note: Alert for Prairie; White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 28 at 8:32AM CST until March 03 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Arkansas... White River At Georgetown affecting Woodruff, White and Prairie Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Arkansas... White River At Des Arc affecting Prairie County. White River At Augusta affecting White and Woodruff Counties. White River At Clarendon affecting Monroe and Arkansas Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River At Georgetown. * WHEN...Until Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Hurricane Lake Wildlife Management Area and Raft Creek Bottoms inundated. Roads in the bottoms are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 21.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is currently at a stage of 21.1 feet Tuesday morning, Feb 28th. It is forecast to fall to 21.0 feet Tuesday evening, and remain steady at 21.0 feet through Thursday evening, March 2nd. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 6 AM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Crest Time Date White River Georgetown 21.0 21.1 Tue 8 AM 21.0 21.0 20.9 FALLING SLOWLY &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
